Добро пожаловать на наш веб-сайт для пуб: Welcome to our article publishing website!
Наш проект является веб-сайтом, разработ: Our project is a website developed as part of a final qualifying work using modern web technologies. We provide a platform to publish and view articles on various topics.
Мы придерживаемся методологии Feature sl: We adhere to the Feature sliced design methodology, which helps us structure the code for convenient development and support of the project.
Для управления данными мы используем Red: We use Redux Toolkit to manage data. Interaction with the server is carried out via RTK query. We also use DynamicModuleLoader to load reducers asynchronously.
Мы используем Storybook для описания сто: We use Storybook to describe story cases for each component of our application. This helps us visualize and test components in isolation. You can run Storybook using the npm run storybook command.
Мы интегрировали непрерывную интеграцию: We have integrated continuous integration into our repository using GitHub Actions. Within CI, all types of tests are run, the project is assembled and checked by linters. We also set up pre-commit hooks to automatically check the code before committing
Для обеспечения многоязычности сайта исп: To ensure the site is multilingual, the i18next library is used. This makes it easy to add new languages and translate content.
Было уделено большое внимание тестирован: To ensure the site is multilingual, the i18next library is used. This makes it easy to add new languages and translate content.
Для поддержания чистоты и качества кода: To maintain code cleanliness and quality, eslint is used for TypeScript code and stylelint for style files. We also developed our own eslint plugin to strictly control the main architectural principles.
